com.facebook.litho

Class ComponentCallbackLayoutEventHandler<E>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.facebook.litho.EventHandler<E>
      • com.facebook.litho.ComponentCallbackLayoutEventHandler<E>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Equivalence<EventHandler<E>>, EventDispatcher, HasEventDispatcher, Function<java.lang.Void>

    public final class ComponentCallbackLayoutEventHandler<E>
extends EventHandler<E>
implements HasEventDispatcher, EventDispatcher
    This class acts as wrapper to any kind of EventHandler which allows a ComponentContext to understand when a specific event handling starts and finishes.

    This is a core piece to batched state updates, since it allow us to delay any layout calculation until the moment we know the event was handled.
